post.content:
This dish is called “Spicy Black Bean and Sweet Potato Tacos”:

Ingredients:

  • 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon cumin
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup cooked black beans
  • 1/4 cup salsa
  • 8 small corn or flour tortillas
  • 1/2 cup shredded cheese (such as cheddar or Monterey Jack)
  • 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
  • Optional toppings: diced avocado, diced red onion, diced tomato, sour cream

Instructions:

  1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
  2. In a medium bowl, toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil, chili powder, cumin, and salt. Spread the sweet potatoes in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
  3. Bake the sweet potatoes for 20-25 minutes, until they are tender and starting to brown.
  4. In a small saucepan, heat the black beans and salsa over medium heat until hot.
  5. Warm the tortillas in a dry frying pan over medium heat, or wrap them in foil and warm them in the oven for 5-10 minutes.
  6. To assemble the tacos, spread a spoonful of the black bean mixture onto each tortilla. Top with the baked sweet potatoes, shredded cheese, and cilantro. Add any desired toppings, such as diced avocado, diced red onion, diced tomato, and sour cream.
  7. Fold the tortillas in half and serve the tacos hot.

These tacos are a delicious and satisfying combination of spicy and sweet flavors, with a nutritious boost from the black beans and sweet potatoes. They’re a great option for a quick and easy meal that can be customized with your favorite toppings. Enjoy!
post.title: Spicy Black Bean and Sweet Potato Tacos
